content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
─────────────────────
### Smelting Structure at position (1.0, 1.0)
Consists of:
• Stone Furnace used for smelting iron ore into iron plates

### Electricity Network Structure
Consists of:
• Lab at position (10.5, 10.5) with no power
• Steam Engine at position (8.5, 10.5) connected to the lab via Small Electric Poles

### Water Network Connection Structure
Consists of:
• Offshore Pump at position (–1.5, 28.5) with connection point at (–1.5, 27.5)
• Boiler at position (11.5, 14.0) with connection point at (9.5, 14.5)
• Integrated PipeGroups that are arranged for water distribution

ERROR TIPS
────────────
• Water Connection Failures
  – Repeated errors indicate missing required pipe items during connection attempts.
  – Verify that all necessary pipe items are available in the inventory before initiating connection commands.

• Entity Placement and Retrieval Issues
  – Lab placement errors due to missing lab in inventory.
  – Steam engine retrieval errors occur when the specified position does not have the expected entity.
  – Ensure inventory and map positions match the intended entity placements and retrieval calls.

• Crafting Resource Shortage
  – Pipe crafting failures stem from insufficient smelted resources or missing sub-ingredients.
  – Confirm that adequate iron plates are produced and available prior to initiating bulk crafting commands.
